newsitem.title: USA: U.S. corn weekly export sales highlights--USDA.
newsitem.headline: U.S. corn weekly export sales highlights--USDA.

text.p: USDA corn export sales highlights in latest reporting week:
Net sales of 323,100 MT were off 43 percent from the previous week and two-thirds below the 4-week average.

Major increases reported for Japan (327,600 MT), Portugal (65,900 MT), South Korea (57,700 MT, reflects 5,200 new sales, 52,500 destination changes), Mexico (25,300 MT), and Algeria (21,000 MT) were partially offset by reductions for unknown destinations (100,200 MT), Saudi Arabia (50,000 MT), Ecuador (45,000 MT), and Spain (33,400 MT).

Exports of 861,800 MT were 17 percent lower than the previous week and 14 percent less than the 4-week average. The primary destinations were Japan (219,800 MT), Spain (157,200 MT), South Korea (128,500 MT), Portugal (125,900 MT), and Taiwan (103,500 MT).
